Package ohos.agp.components.element

Class Element

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.element.Element
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElementContainer, PixelMapElement, ShapeElement, VectorElement

    public abstract class Element
extends Object
    An abstract class of something that can be drawn.

    When static images need to be displayed in an application, this class and its child classes can be used to draw shapes and images. These child classes can resolve issues in specific image use situations.

    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Element.ConstantState
      An abstract class of Element used to store constant states and data shared by Elements instances.
      static interface  Element.OnChangeListener
      Provides a callback to listen for element changes.

    • Method Detail

      • setAlpha

        public void setAlpha​(int alpha)
        Sets the alpha value of an element object.

        Value 0 indicates complete transparency, and value 255 indicates complete opacity.

        Parameters:
        alpha - Indicates the alpha value.
        See Also:
        getAlpha()

      • getAlpha

        public int getAlpha​()
        Obtains the alpha value of an element object.

        Value 0 indicates complete transparency, and value 255 indicates complete opacity. This method is implemented by Element child classes. The default alpha value is 255.

        Returns:
        Returns the alpha value.
        See Also:
        setAlpha(int)

      • drawToCanvas

        public void drawToCanvas​(Canvas canvas)
        Draws an Element object on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Indicates the canvas on which to draw the element.
        Since:
        3

      • setVisible

        public boolean setVisible​(boolean visible,
                          boolean restart)
        Sets whether an Element object is visible.
        Parameters:
        visible - Specifies whether the Element object is visible. Value true indicates that the Element object is visible, and false indicates the opposite.
        restart - Specifies whether to restart the visible state of the Element object. Value true indicates that the visible state is restarted; and false indicates the opposite.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if the latest visible state is different from the previous state; returns false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getVisible()

      • getVisible

        public boolean getVisible​()
        Obtains the visible state of a public Element object.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns the visible state of the Element object.
        See Also:
        setVisible(boolean, boolean)

      • isStateful

        public boolean isStateful​()
        Checks whether the state of an Element object is changed based on the component state.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Element object state is changed; returns false otherwise.

      • getCurrentElement

        public Element getCurrentElement​()
        Obtains the Element object in use.
        Returns:
        Returns the Element object in use in normal cases; returns the child Element object in use if an ElementContainer is used.

      • release

        public void release​()
        Releases all resources.

        If a component is using the Element object, a runtime exception is thrown. When a ElementContainer object is released, all child Element objects are released.

      • setBounds

        public void setBounds​(int left,
                      int top,
                      int right,
                      int bottom)
        Sets the bounds of an Element object using a Rect object.

        NOTE: Bound values could be ignored by some components and Element object can be adjusted to fill container for it.

        Parameters:
        left - Indicates the left bound of the Element object, in pixels.
        top - Indicates the top bound of the Element object, in pixels.
        right - Indicates the right bound of the Element object, in pixels.
        bottom - Indicates the bottom bound of the Element object, in pixels.
        See Also:
        getBounds(), setBounds(Rect)

      • setBounds

        public void setBounds​(Rect bounds)
        Sets the bound of rectangle an Element object using a Rect object.

        NOTE: bounds value could be ignored by some components and Element object can be adjusted to fill container for it.

        Parameters:
        bounds - Indicates the bounds.
        See Also:
        getBounds(), setBounds(int, int, int, int)

      • getBounds

        public final Rect getBounds​()
        Obtains the bounds rectangle of an Element object.

        NOTE: Bounds value could be ignored by some components and Element object can be adjusted to fill container for it.

        Returns:
        Returns the bounds rectangle.
        See Also:
        setBounds(Rect), setBounds(int, int, int, int)

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth​()
        Obtains the width of this Element object.
        Returns:
        Returns the element width; returns -1 if the element width was not set.
        Since:
        3

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight​()
        Obtains the height of this Element object.
        Returns:
        Returns the element height; returns -1 if the element height was not set.
        Since:
        3

      • getMinWidth

        public int getMinWidth​()
        Obtains the minimum Element width suitable for the layout. If the element is used as the background of a component,the width of the component must be greater than or equal to the obtained width.
        Returns:
        Returns the suitable element width; returns 0 if the element width was not set.
        Since:
        3

      • getMinHeight

        public int getMinHeight​()
        Obtains the minimum Element height suitable for the layout. If the element is used as the background of a component,the height of the component must be greater than or equal to the obtained height.
        Returns:
        Returns the suitable element height; returns 0 if the element height was not set.
        Since:
        3

      • setColorMatrix

        public void setColorMatrix​(ColorMatrix matrix)
        Sets the color matrix for this Element object.

        Element colors and the alpha value can be changed by using the color matrix.

        Parameters:
        matrix - Indicates the color matrix used as a filter.
        Since:
        3

      • getColorMatrix

        public ColorMatrix getColorMatrix​()
        Obtains the color matrix of this Element object.
        Returns:
        Returns the color matrix.
        Since:
        3

      • clearColorMatrix

        public void clearColorMatrix​()
        Clears the color matrix of this Element object.
        Since:
        3

      • setStateColorList

        public void setStateColorList​(int[][] colorState,
                              int[] colors)
        Sets Element states and their corresponding colors.

        The length of the state list must equal that of the color list.

        Parameters:
        colorState - Indicates a list of element states. The value can be obtained from the ComponentState class.
        colors - Indicates a list of colors corresponding to the element states. The value can be obtained from the Color class.
        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        ComponentState, Color

      • setStateColorMode

        public void setStateColorMode​(BlendMode mode)
        Sets a BlendMode object for this Element object.

        This method applies the colors listed in BlendMode to this Element object.

        Parameters:
        mode - Indicates the BlendMode object to set.
        Since:
        4

      • setCallback

        public void setCallback​(Element.OnChangeListener listener)
        Sets a listener for element attribute changes, such as the attributes set by setVisible(boolean, boolean), setBounds(int, int, int, int), and setColorMatrix(ohos.agp.render.ColorMatrix).
        Parameters:
        listener - Indicates the listener to set.
        Since:
        3

      • getCallback

        public Element.OnChangeListener getCallback​()
        Obtains the listener for element attribute changes
        Returns:
        Returns the listener; returns null if the listener was not set.
        Since:
        4

      • skipAnimation

        public void skipAnimation​()
        Skips the animation of this Element object.
        Since:
        3

      • setInheritDirection

        public void setInheritDirection​(boolean followRTL)
        When the layoutDirection of the component which set element as background is RTL, set if the element weather display RTL with the component.
        Parameters:
        followRTL - set true indicates the element will display RTL follow up the component.
        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        Component.LayoutDirection

      • isInheritDirection

        public boolean isInheritDirection​()
        Obtain the element weather display RTL with the component.
        Returns:
        true if the element display RTL when the component layoutDirection is RTL, otherwise return false.
        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        Component.LayoutDirection
